Text:
Thanks for these Superman Chronologies. An excellent place to start reading Supes!

Much appreciated.

Did you used to do this on Demonoid? regardless I'd like to invite you to consider cross posting these at h33t.com. We've got some of the old demonoid comics crew and a lot of others. It's become a really good comics torrent site. hope to see you there.
These are great!   Ive been wanting to catch up on what Supes has been up to since I quit reading     back in the early/mid 90's-  Thanks a heep!
For the love of all that is the piratebay, please SEED Part 1, part3, and part 4. the others are still seeding but these have been just about DEAD for the last 3 months.
